textTemplates.name: Body_EN
textTemplates.text:
Hello


As you have recently contacted the Seller Support Center, we would like to know your rating of our support and what could be improved. Please take 2 minutes to provide us with feedback, by clicking on the following link: LINK


Thanks in advance for your time

The Seller Support Team

textTemplates.name: Body_FR
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour


Comme vous avez récemment contacté le centre d'assistance aux vendeurs, nous aimerions connaître votre évaluation de notre assistance et ce qui pourrait être amélioré. Veuillez prendre 2 minutes pour nous faire part de vos commentaires, en cliquant sur le lien suivant : LINK


Merci d'avance pour votre temps

The Seller Support Team

textTemplates.name: EN_BuybackCasePaid_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


As mentioned in a previous email, one or more of your direct debit payments in the amount of {!$Record.Chargeback_Amount__c} were refused by your bank. 

We’ve since received your transfer covering the overdraft amount as well as the fee of 7,5€ per order, so your account has been reactivated.

Thanks for your payment. You’re all set to participate in BuyBack again.


Best,

BackBot

textTemplates.name: EN_NewCase_Buyback_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


Recently one or more of your direct debit payments for {!$Record.Account.Name} were refused by your bank. See details attached.

Don’t worry, we covered the payment of each order for you, but you’ll be billed for the total amount of the orders plus a fee of 7,5€ per order. 

Your store has been taken offline temporarily but will be reactivated once you have transferred the money and we have proof of the deposit.

You can find Back Market’s invoice and bank details attached to this email. Please note the invoice must be paid as soon as possible.


Feel free to reach out with any questions.

Best,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: FR_BuybackCasePaid_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Comme annoncé il y a quelques jours, un ou plusieurs de vos paiements effectués par prélèvement SEPA ont été refusés ces dernières semaines, pour un montant de {!$Record.Chargeback_Amount__c}.

Vous avez été débité du montant des paiements et de la pénalité de 7,5€ par commande.

Votre Portefeuille Virtuel étant suffisamment crédité, ces montants ont pu être compensés, conformément à l'article "Paiement compensatoire" de nos CGV, comme indiqué sur la dernière facture. Votre compte de rachat a donc été réactivé.


Bien à vous,

L'équipe Buyback

textTemplates.name: FR_BuybackCasePaid_EmailSubject
textTemplates.text: [Reprise] - Votre boutique est de nouveau en ligne - Merci pour votre régularisation

textTemplates.name: FR_NewCase_Buyback_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Un ou plusieurs paiements effectués par le magasin {!$Record.Account.Name} (qui est en prélèvement SEPA) ont été refusés courant ces dernières semaines. Le détail des paiements est en pièce jointe.

En raison du refus de votre banque, Back Market a pris en charge le paiement de chaque commande plus une pénalité de 7,5 euros par commande. Le montant TTC des commandes et la pénalité vous sont donc refacturés.

Par conséquent, votre compte a été mis hors ligne. Il sera réactivé une fois la preuve de virement envoyée.

Je vous joins donc la facture et le RIB de Back Market. La facture est à régler au plus vite.


N'hésitez pas à nous contacter si vous rencontrez un problème ou pour toute information complémentaire.

Bonne journée,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: US_BuybackCasePaid_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


As mentioned in a previous email, one or more of your direct debit payments in the amount of {!$Record.Chargeback_Amount__c} were refused by your bank. 

We’ve since received your transfer covering the overdraft amount as well as the fee of $8 per order, so your account has been reactivated.

Thanks for your payment. You’re all set to participate in BuyBack again.


Best,

BackBot

textTemplates.name: US_EN_BuybackCasePaid_EmailSubject
textTemplates.text: [BuyBack] Your store is back online — thanks for your payment

textTemplates.name: US_EN_NewCase_Buyback_EmailSubject
textTemplates.text: [BuyBack] Overdraft alert — the bank account for {!$Record.Account.Name} has been overdrawn

textTemplates.name: US_NewCase_Buyback_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


Recently one or more of your direct debit payments for {!$Record.Account.Name} were refused by your bank. See details attached.

Don’t worry, we covered the payment of each order for you, but you’ll be billed for the total amount of the orders plus a fee of $8 per order. 

Your store has been taken offline temporarily but will be reactivated once you have transferred the money and we have proof of the deposit.

You can find Back Market’s invoice and bank details attached to this email. Please note the invoice must be paid as soon as possible.


Feel free to reach out with any questions.

Best,

Back Market
